item.title: Welcome to AEM 2850 + truth, beauty, and data
item.description:
Readings

  • The syllabus
  • Chapter 1 (read through 1.2, skim 1.3+) of Data Visualization by Kieran Healy

Optional Readings

  • Study: Charts change hearts and minds better than words do
  • Tim Harford, “Florence Nightingale: Data Viz Pioneer," 99% Invisible

Questions to reflect on

  • How do we know what is true?
  • Are facts truth?
  • Why do we visualize data?
  • What makes a great visualization?
  • How do you choose which kind of visualization to use?
